definition: to research/to check/to investigate/to examine/to refer to/to look up (e.g. a word in a dictionary)
to explore/to search out/to scout/to visit/to stretch forward

sentences.english: Search the furthest villages, find more metal.
sentences.chinese: 到最遠的村莊去查探，找更多的金屬回來。

sentences.english: He flips the table over in the center of the room and begins tossing the room.
sentences.chinese: 他掀翻了擺放在房子中心的桌子，在房內到處查探。

sentences.english: Search the furthest villages find more metal.
sentences.chinese: 到最遠的村裝去查探，找更多的金屬回來。

definition: to investigate/to observe/to scout/to seek out and examine/to explore
to examine/to probe/to scout out/to nose around
to make inquiries/to try to find out/to pry
to find out/to ascertain/to get an idea of
to make discreet inquiries/to scout out
to visit/to go to see what's going on
intelligence gatherer/spy/detective/scout/sound (medical instrument)/long and narrow probing and sampling utensil
to pry into/to spy on/to probe into
